$chebgonaz_thrownweapons_desc: A mighty sword appears embedded within this stone.
$chebgonaz_thrownweapons_empty: Just a regular stone where a mighty sword once was.
$chebgonaz_thrownweapons_unworthy: Try as you might, the sword will not budge.
$chebgonaz_excalibur_desc: Excalibur is the mythical sword of King Arthur.
